original_text: I know that trouble will soon come to you. But do not be afraid. Listen! The Devil will cause some of you to go to prison. He wants to see whether you will continue to believe in me. As a result, you will suffer for ten days. But continue to trust me, even if you die. Then you will win against the Devil. I will give you a gift, as they give a crown to the winner of a race. You will have life with me for ever.
korean_text: 너는 장차 받을 고난을 두려워하지 말라 볼지어다 마귀가 장차 너희 가운데에서 몇 사람을 옥에 던져 시험을 받게 하리니 너희가 십 일 동안 환난을 받으리라 네가 죽도록 충성하라 그리하면 내가 생명의 관을 네게 주리라

sentences.original_text: I know that trouble will soon come to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 곧 환난이 이를 줄을 안다.

sentences.original_text: The Devil will cause some of you to go to prison.
sentences.korean_translation: 마귀가 너희 중 어떤 이들을 감옥에 던져 넣으리니.

sentences.original_text: He wants to see whether you will continue to believe in me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희가 나를 계속 믿을지 시험하고자 한다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, you will suffer for ten days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 너희는 열 날 동안 고난을 받으리라.

sentences.original_text: But continue to trust me, even if you die.
Then you will win against the Devil.
I will give you a gift,
as they give a crown to the winner of a race.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 사람들이 경주의 우승자에게 왕관을 주는 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: You will have life with me for ever.
